channel.title: School on Marco Martorana
channel.description: Recent content in School on Marco Martorana

item.title: Programming the DJI Tello Drone with Python (ep. 2)
item.description:
Programming the DJI Tello Drone with Python

The DJI Tello is a compact, affordable, and programmable drone ideal for beginners and educators looking to explore the world of drone technology and coding. Equipped with a camera, it offers a variety of features, including video transmission, precise hovering, and basic tricks. Its compatibility with Python enables developers and enthusiasts to create custom behaviors and flight paths, making it an excellent tool for both learning and experimentation.

item.title: Drone Tello DJI unboxing (ep. 1)
item.description:
Introduction to the DJI Tello Drone ( My Unboxing )

The DJI Tello is a compact, affordable, and beginner-friendly drone developed by Ryze Tech in collaboration with DJI. Designed for both fun and educational purposes, the Tello is perfect for newcomers to drone flying as well as those looking to explore drone programming.

item.title: Visualizing Algorithms
item.description:
Visualizing Algorithms: Key Tools and Techniques for Enhanced Understanding

Visualizing how an algorithm works can significantly enhance comprehension and facilitate the learning process. Several tools and techniques are available to help both beginners and experts understand algorithms through visual representation. Here are a few notable tools:
